events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer's message contains keywords indicating a refund request, so the issue is classified as a Refund.
The case has been assigned to the refunds specialist team for further assistance and processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you want to request a refund for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number so we can proceed with the refund?
Here is the photo of the item I got and my order number is 12345XYZ. Please confirm the refund process.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and you should see the amount credited within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving the refund soon.
The refund request has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory with the resolution.
As there has been no further response, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
